attributes.action: Investigate forced sterilisation of Uighur women and separating their children.
attributes.additional_details: The UK government considers China a strategic international partner and particularly in the sphere of economics.
attributes.background: Pressure and lobby the Chinese government to stop these practices and release the forced captivation of the Uighur people and allow further UN and aid organisations to monitor the situation with review programs.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300146
